trigger.expression: {Template App Pacemaker node:script.pacemaker.1.last()}=1 and {Template App Pacemaker node:log[/var/log/corosync/corosync.log,,,,skip,].count(60,"error","like")}>0
trigger.name: Pacemaker: corosync.log - error msg detected

trigger.expression: {Template App Pacemaker node:script.pacemaker.1.last()}=1 and {Template App Pacemaker node:log[/var/log/corosync/corosync.log,,,,skip,].count(60,"warning","like")}>0
trigger.name: Pacemaker: corosync.log - warning msg detected

trigger.expression: {Template App Pacemaker node:script.pacemaker.1.last()}=1 and {Template App Pacemaker node:log[/var/log/pacemaker.log,,,,skip,].count(60,"error","like")}>0
trigger.name: Pacemaker: pacemaker.log - error msg detected

trigger.expression: {Template App Pacemaker node:script.pacemaker.1.last()}=1 and {Template App Pacemaker node:log[/var/log/pacemaker.log,,,,skip,].count(60,"warning","like")}>0
trigger.name: Pacemaker: pacemaker.log - warning msg detected
